    public class Food
extends Entity

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the food object. Removes the food if there is no food left and lowers the amount of food left if this food object is set to decay.

      • eat

        public double eat(double amount)
        Takes an amount of food (the requested amount to be eaten) and returns the actual amount eaten, accounting for any potential lack of food. EG: the amount may be more than food left.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of food requested
        Returns:
        The amount of food given
